Html:
I have been very impressed with this tool. The only question I have is where does it store my diagrams when I am using the "Chrome Store" client? Is it storing it on my local machine? If not, what is the limit as to the number of diagrams that can be stored? Is it possible to store them on my Google Drive?

Thanks,
Jeff Bradley

Jeff,

Diagrams are stored in a database on the server that hosts the app. There's no limit on the number or size of the diagrams that can be stored right now, and I don't anticipate limiting the space any time soon. Local storage for offline editing has been requested. Storage on google drive seems like a good idea too.

Thanks,
Gabriel
